CatDescriptText: Mrs. Martha Morris, 910 Bryn Mawr Road, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg.5 with question: "Do you think that the city needs a fair housing ordinance?" answer reads: �We need one very badly. Regardless of the circumstances, you can�t go where you want to go or live where you want to live.  If your money allows you to buy in a certain area of town, your color should be no barrier towards your being able to live there.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Martha Morris, wearing earrings and fuzzy coat with hood, holding wicker handbag, newspaper, and paper bag, standing in front of light colored pillar, with two glass doors and address 201 on right
